snippet.title: How To Play - Melbits Pod
snippet.description:
The Melbits POD is a magical device, a vessel for Melbits to enter the physical world and absorb the energy of nature. Combining the powers of nature, you can hatch your own digital kawaii virtual pets. 

Do you want to know how it works? :)
https://melbitspod.com/
